e.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdbef5f0c787055227243a7318ef74c8a5a1108ca3a07f2b3a00ef67769e1e397","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://08e39f23d5b4692f9a40803e53a8156b72b4c1f9902a88cd65ba964db103dab9","dweb:/ipfs/QmPKn6EYDgpga7KtpkA8wV2yJCYGMtc9K4LkJfhKX2RVSV"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/interfaces/IERC1967.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb25a4f11fa80c702bf5cd85adec90e6f6f507f32f4a8e6f5dbc31e8c10029486","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6917f8a323e7811f041aecd4d9fd6e92455a6fba38a797ac6f6e208c7912b79d","dweb:/ipfs/QmShuYv55wYHGi4EFkDB8QfF7ZCHoKk2efyz3AWY1ExSq7"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/interfaces/draft-IERC1822.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc42facb5094f2f35f066a7155bda23545e39a3156faef3ddc00185544443ba7d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d3b36282ab029b46bd082619a308a2ea11c309967b9425b7b7a6eb0b0c1c3196","dweb:/ipfs/QmP2YVfDB2FoREax3vJu7QhDnyYRMw52WPrCD4vdT2kuDA"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/proxy/ERC1967/ERC1967Utils.sol":{"keccak256":"0x911c3346ee26afe188f3b9dc267ef62a7ccf940aba1afa963e3922f0ca3d8a06","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://04539f4419e44a831807d7203375d2bc6a733da256efd02e51290f5d5015218c","dweb:/ipfs/QmPZ97gsAAgaMRPiE2WJfkzRsudQnW5tPAvMgGj1jcTJtR"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/proxy/beacon/IBeacon.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc59a78b07b44b2cf2e8ab4175fca91e8eca1eee2df7357b8d2a8833e5ea1f64c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5aa4f07e65444784c29cd7bfcc2341b34381e4e5b5da9f0c5bd00d7f430e66fa","dweb:/ipfs/QmWRMh4Q9DpaU9GvsiXmDdoNYMyyece9if7hnfLz7uqzWM"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Address.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9d8da059267bac779a2dbbb9a26c2acf00ca83085e105d62d5d4ef96054a47f5","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c78e2aa4313323cecd1ef12a8d6265b96beee1a199923abf55d9a2a9e291ad23","dweb:/ipfs/QmUTs2KStXucZezzFo3EYeqYu47utu56qrF7jj1Gue65vb"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Errors.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6afa713bfd42cf0f7656efa91201007ac465e42049d7de1d50753a373648c123","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://ba1d02f4847670a1b83dec9f7d37f0b0418d6043447b69f3a29a5f9efc547fcf","dweb:/ipfs/QmQ7iH2keLNUKgq2xSWcRmuBE5eZ3F5whYAkAGzCNNoEWB"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/StorageSlot.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcf74f855663ce2ae00ed8352666b7935f6cddea2932fdf2c3ecd30a9b1cd0e97","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9f660b1f351b757dfe01438e59888f31f33ded3afcf5cb5b0d9bf9aa6f320a8b","dweb:/ipfs/QmarDJ5hZEgBtCmmrVzEZWjub9769eD686jmzb2XpSU1cM"]},"src/Duel.sol":{"keccak256":"0x428e108ec8c959807e383e4ba6304d2d953ebb23c0319ea355eceeb597d6e1ce","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c3cf9a9f0881d4294cd09f68b029fcbfca6491a9dfd743284f829c17f81812d1","dweb:/ipfs/QmefG6ER3sjEji5PcXEfYQ1MLh8bfXE1spAcutfZWTo2wR"]}},"version":1}

initialize(uint256,address,address,strin.details: This function is called by the `DuelFactory` upon deployment.

params._amount: The target amount of funding for both Option contracts in wei.
params._decisionLockDuration: Duration in seconds for the decision lock period.
params._duelWallet: Address to which the fee will be sent.
params._factory: Address of the factory contract that deployed this duel.
params._fundingDuration: Duration in seconds for the funding period.
params._judge: Address of the judge for the duel (can be zero if no judge).
params._payoutA: Address for player A's payout wallet.
params._playerA: Address of player A, the creator of the duel.
params._playerB: Address of player B, the participant.
params._title: Title or description of the duel.

judgeAccept().details: Only callable by the judge during the funding period, and only once.

judgeDecide(address).details: Only callable by the judge if a judge is assigned and the decision period is active.

params._winner: Address of the winning option (either optionA or optionB).

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

playerBAccept(address).details: Only callable by player B during the funding period and requires ETH to fund OptionB contract.

params._payoutB: Address for player B's payout wallet.

playersAgree(address).details: Only callable by players A and B during the decision period.

params._winner: Address of the winning option (either optionA or optionB).

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setOptionsAddresses(address,address).details: This function is only callable by the factory contract when creating the Duel.

params._optionA: Address of the contract representing option A.
params._optionB: Address of the contract representing option B.

params._payoutAddress: The address where the payout should be sent for the caller.

returns._0: success Boolean indicating successful update of payout address.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateStatus().details: This function checks whether the funding or decision period has ended and marks the duel as expired if applicable.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

initialize(uint256,address,address,strin.notice: Initializes the `Duel` contract with the required parameters.

judgeAccept().notice: Allows the judge to accept their role in the duel during the funding period.

judgeDecide(address).notice: Allows the judge to decide the winner during the decision period.

playerBAccept(address).notice: Allows player B to accept the duel and fund their side.

playersAgree(address).notice: Allows players A and B to agree on a winner when there is no judge.

setOptionsAddresses(address,address).notice: Sets the addresses of option A and option B contracts.

setPayoutAddress(address).notice: Sets the payout address for either player A or player B during the funding period.

updateStatus().notice: Updates the status of the duel based on funding and decision periods.

documentation.text:
@notice Updates the status of the duel based on funding and decision periods.
 @dev This function checks whether the funding or decision period has ended and marks the duel as expired if applicable.
